trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Sparks
There were no other sightings in Sparks on or around September 2nd 2009
Summary: A bright light in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night I was on the phone in the upstairs looking East toward some hills by our house and I saw this bright light for about an hour hoover around the top of the hills. I know there are no houses up there I was not sure what it was. And it just disappeared. It kinda danced around some almost appeared it floated above the top of the hills. I could not tell what it was from a distance but it was a very bright light. I have never seen anything like it before. It was dark out and I could not compare it to anything that I have seen before. It appeared in some ways to be watching me or I could see it.It was right in my line of sight.
